mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT m.* FROM sys_menu AS m INNER JOIN sys_role_menu AS rm ON m.id=rm.menu_id INNER JOIN sys_user_role AS ur ON ur.role_id=rm.role_id WHERE ur.user_id=#{userId} AND m.type = 0 AND m.pid=#{pid} AND m.`status`=1 AND m.mark=1 ORDER BY m.sort ASC;
SELECT * FROM sys_menu WHERE type <= 2 AND mark=1 ORDER BY pid ASC,sort ASC;

SELECT DISTINCT m.permission FROM sys_menu AS m INNER JOIN sys_role_menu AS rm ON m.id=rm.menu_id INNER JOIN sys_user_role AS ur ON ur.role_id=rm.role_id WHERE ur.user_id=#{userId} AND m.type=1 AND m.`status`=1 AND m.mark=1 ORDER BY m.sort ASC;
